name: HYDRASCAPE: Pet Edition
description:
Ever wanted to care for a three headed dragon-wolf? Well, now you can in HYDRASCAPE! An underworld very few have the courage to dwell, it's your to rule as your own.

You have the creative ability to name your Hydra, your cave and even customize your Caregiver as well! Take your Caregiver out to adventure the underworld for treasures and use your finds to better care for your Hydra. Be sure to visit the Mystic Shop, the magical being is said to run the shop. This magical being was also the one who traded the Hydra to your care, so do your best not to disappoint!

This game was made for the Game Jame, Virtual Pet Jam held by Team Dogpit!

https://itch.io/jam/virtual-pet-jam
